leg.name: leg
leg.transformationDescription:
[npc.her] skin starts to feel tight as dark patches form on the thinnest parts of [npc.her] skin, [npc.her] feet start to deform as [npc.her] toes start to fuse and long talons rip threw the tips of [npc.her] tight skin. Suddenly [npc.her] skin gives into the tention and rips apart agressivly revealing [npc.legFullDescription].
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] reptilian, [style.boldDog(snapper legs and feet)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are formed into three toed snapper feet, complete with sharp claws and rough reptilian skin.
